item.title: Andii add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Andii add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "I hope she'll be a fool -- that's the best thing a girl can be in this world, a beautiful little fool." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Andii add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "And I like large parties. They’re so intimate. At small parties there isn’t any privacy." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Andii add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "Can’t repeat the past?…Why of course you can!" -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Andii add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "His heart beat faster and faster as Daisy’s white face came up to his own. He knew that when he kissed this girl, and forever wed his unutterable visions to her perishable breath, his mind would never romp again like the mind of God. So he waited, listening for a moment longer to the tuning fork that had been struck upon a star. Then he kissed her. At his lips’ touch she blossomed like a flower and the incarnation was complete." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Andii add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "It’s a great advantage not to drink among hard drinking people." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Andii add a quote by Alexandra Robbins
item.description: "No student should be encouraged -- by anyone -- to change himself until he's "normal," a term that says everything and means nothing." -- Alexandra Robbins
